thread.title: Yosemite: The essential guide to enjoying autumn’s spectacle
thread.title_full: Yosemite: The essential guide to enjoying autumn’s spectacle - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Tom Stienstra
title: Yosemite: The essential guide to enjoying autumn’s spectacle
text:
Photo: Yosemite Conservancy This ID chart in photo identifies the prominent mountaintops and points of landscape visitors to Yosemite National Park can see from the lookout at Glacier Point. This ID chart in photo identifies the prominent mountaintops and...
Yosemite is the showpiece of the Sierra Nevada, and in fall, when aspens and maples turn, the trails quiet and the Merced River slows to a trickle, it can feel like you are living in a painting — or an Ansel Adams photograph — when you visit. This ID chart in photo identifies the prominent mountaintops and points of landscape visitors to Yosemite National Park can see from the lookout at Glacier Point.
